Edison Real Estate is working to establish itself as one of the most trusted real estate brands in Bangladesh; Edison Apricus and Edison Amour will further solidify Edison’s name in the industry.

The evolution of residential buildings is an essential indicator of the socio-economic development of a country. It is a yardstick of the living standard and taste of its dwellers. Over the past decade, Dhaka has seen remarkable development in its real-estate sector, promoting some incredible modern architecture. Dhaka’s aesthetic transformation has been led by some of the largest real estate developers in the country. Among them, Edison Real Estate has quickly risen through the ranks by creating opulent residences with state-of-the-art facilities.
A concern of Edison Group, Edison Real Estate is a popular choice for Bangladesh’s consumers for facilitating opulent yet affordable living spaces, with sustainability pervading in every brick of its development. Its parent company, Edison Group, is one of the fastest-growing conglomerates in Bangladesh. It has successfully diversified its portfolio through investment in technology, communication, power, building solutions, real estate, electronics, value-added service, and footwear sectors. Therefore, the excellence and competency of Edison Real Estate comes as no surprise to Bangladesh’s real estate consumers. Since 2015, Edison Real Estate’s primary focus has been to incorporate elements of sustainable living in each of their projects, leveraging cutting-edge technologies and advanced equipment. Through the infusion of biophilic design and architecture, the utilization of up-to-date technologies, and the provision of superior brands in our projects, Edison offers modern conveniences and buildings that reverberate upscale living. Perhaps, Edison’s greatest strength is its ability to conserve spaces and bring out the components of nature in every portfolio.

At the start of the new decade, Edison Real Estate developed two luxury residential projects in one of Dhaka’s most prominent locations. Edison Apricus and Edison Amour are two adjacent projects located in Japan Street of Bashundhara Residential Area. Each building is built on 20 kathas of land with a fifty-foot wide road in front. To facilitate a lavish and tranquil living, Apricus will offer fifty-feet flats, ranging from 2331-3019 Sft. Amour, on the other hand, will provide the same number of apartments with sizes ranging from 2550-2900 Sq Ft. On top of that, both complexes come with double parking for each apartment and contemporary luxury living amenities including an infinity swimming pool, grand reception, mobility ramp, green view, gym, double-height entry, children’s playing area, community hall area and lake view lobby.

The location is only five minutes away from Gulshan 2 and Baridhara Diplomatic Zone. The projects infuse all elements of opulence that enhances your sense of inner peace. They are meticulously designed and aesthetically built with durable structures to provide optimum comfort. Adequate space is accommodated to bring in beautiful outdoor elements, which accentuates the unique features of these state-of-the-art buildings. The projects also offer the peace and tranquillity that lakeside properties usually offer.

Edison Apricus and Edison Amour offer meticulously planned interiors full of amenities designed to perfection. The vast glass walls give a premium look and allow light and fresh air circulation throughout. In a short period, Edison Real Estate has established itself as one of the most trusted real estate brands in Bangladesh. Edison Apricus and Edison Amour will further solidify Edison’s name in the industry.
